step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped loosely in your lap, maintaining an upright posture.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you bring your hands toward your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Continue to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Maintain this position, focusing on the stretch in your chest and shoulders.
Smooth return to the starting position. Remember to reverse the motion carefully.
Second rep starting well. Ensure hands are clasped comfortably in your lap.
Good movement towards the forehead. Focus on keeping those elbows from drifting too far apart.
Excellent spread of the elbows behind your head. Keep that head tall and avoid any forward pull.
Holding the stretch effectively. You're doing great maintaining good form.
Controlled return to the start. You've completed both repetitions well!

exercise_summary: You've done a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head. Remember to maintain an upright posture throughout.
